title: A mechanistic spatio-temporal framework for modelling ...
summary: This article proposes a mechanistic spatio-temporal framework for modeling, discussing nonhomogeneous Poisson processes, stationary point processes, and population density data.
usefulness_reason: The title explicitly mentions "spatio-temporal framework for modelling" and the content directly discusses "nonhomogeneous Poisson processes" and "stationary point processes", which are core to "Spatio Temporal Point Process". It also mentions "data generated from a null model" and "Population Density Data", which can be considered a "Contextual dataset".
